comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: His Wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gifford_Pinchot First chief of the US Forest Service, and 28th Governor of Pennsylvania.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Jan 10, 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A00E0DF153BE233A... indicates in a second article in the same extract that Pinchot sailed on the Franconia to spend six weeks with his wife's sister in England. This is probably at the beginning of that journey.
